entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Ice fog patches overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Ice fog patches in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
